name: timer-transition
description: Enumerates the possible transitions of a BACnet timer state.

values.name: idle-to-running
values.description: Transition from Idle state to Running state.

values.name: running-to-idle
values.description: Transition from Running state to Idle state.

values.name: running-to-running
values.description: Transition from Running state to Running state (restart).

values.name: running-to-expired
values.description: Transition from Running state to Expired state (timer elapsed).

values.name: forced-to-expired
values.description: Transition to Expired state due to forced expiration.

values.name: expired-to-idle
values.description: Transition from Expired state to Idle state.

values.name: expired-to-running
values.description: Transition from Expired state to Running state (restart after expiration).
